Autumn Leaves Chords
====================

by [Eric Clapton](https://www.ultimate-guitar.com/artist/eric_clapton_8974)

1,215,548 views 22,459 saves[61 comments](https://tabs.ultimate-guitar.com/tab/eric-clapton/autumn-leaves-chords-1009824#comments)

Author: [DanielParry1993](https://www.ultimate-guitar.com/u/DanielParry1993) [a] 71 9 contributors Difficulty: intermediate

Open Official Backing track

Tuning: [E A D G B E](https://www.ultimate-guitar.com/tools/tuner?tuning=E%20A%20D%20G%20B%20E)Key: Bm Capo: no capo

```
[Intro]
Bm   Bm
 
[Verse 1]
            Em7     A7              Dmaj7   Gmaj7
The falling leaves      drift by my window
           C#m7b5   F#7             Bm   Bm
The autumn leaves        of red and gold
 
 
[Verse 2]
           Em7   A7              Dmaj7   Gmaj7
I see your lips      The summer kisses
              C#m7b5   F#7            Bm   Bm
The sunburned hands         I used to hold
 
 
[Pre-Chorus]
               C#m7b5   F#7                Bm   Bm
Since you went away          the days grow long
              Em7   A7               Dmaj7   Dmaj7
And soon I'll hear      old winter's song
 
 
[Chorus]
       C#m7b5          F#7     Bm      Bm
But I miss you most of all, my darling
C#m7b5              F#7             Bm   Bm
       When autumn leaves start to fall
 
 
[Instrumental]
Em7      A7    Dmaj7   Gmaj7
C#m7b5   F#7   Bm      Bm
Em7      A7    Dmaj7   Gmaj7
C#m7b5   F#7   Bm      Bm
 
 
[Pre-Chorus]
               C#m7b5   F#7                Bm   Bm
Since you went away          the days grow long
              Em7   A7               Dmaj7   Dmaj7
And soon I'll hear      old winter's song
 
 
[Chorus]
       C#m7b5          F#7     Bm      Bm
But I miss you most of all, my darling
     C#m7b5  F#7             Bm   Bm
When autumn leaves start to fall
 
       C#m7b5           F#7     Bm      Bm
Yes, I miss you most of all, my darling
C#m7b5              F#7                     Bm   Bm
       When autumn leaves ... start to ... fall
 
 
[Outro Solo]
Em7      A7    Dmaj7   Gmaj7
C#m7b5   F#7   Bm      Bm
Em7      A7    Dmaj7   Gmaj7
C#m7b5   F#7   Bm      Bm
 
Em7      A7    Dmaj7   Gmaj7
C#m7b5   F#7   Bm      Bm
Em7      A7    Dmaj7   Gmaj7
C#m7b5   F#7   Bm      Bm
 
Em7      A7    Dmaj7   Gmaj7
C#m7b5   F#7   Bm      Bm
X
```

61 comments
-----------

![Image 23: Unregistered](https://tabs.ultimate-guitar.com/static/users/0/0/0/0.gif?d=d&h=1764943525)

![Image 24: WoodR](https://tabs.ultimate-guitar.com/static/users/0/0/7/1919700.gif?d=d)

[WoodR](https://www.ultimate-guitar.com/u/WoodR)10[Aug 7, 2011](https://tabs.ultimate-guitar.com/tab/eric-clapton/autumn-leaves-chords-1009824#4588402)

Hi, Great transcription. The only change I would suggest is changing the C#dim to Em6. Let me know what you think? End

reply

24

![Image 25: -kingcrimson-](https://tabs.ultimate-guitar.com/static/users/4/1/6/4160614.gif?d=d)

[-kingcrimson-](https://www.ultimate-guitar.com/u/-kingcrimson-) [a] 627[Oct 20, 2013](https://tabs.ultimate-guitar.com/tab/eric-clapton/autumn-leaves-chords-1009824#4804460)

Wrong the C#dim is a C#m7b5 (build of the seventh tone in major or second in minor). C#ø is NOT dim. The first part (Em7 A7 Dmaj7 Gmaj7) is in D major The second part (C#m7b5 F#7 Bm) is in B harmonic minor

reply

5

![Image 26: -kingcrimson-](https://tabs.ultimate-guitar.com/static/users/4/1/6/4160614.gif?d=d)

[-kingcrimson-](https://www.ultimate-guitar.com/u/-kingcrimson-) [a] 627[Oct 20, 2013](https://tabs.ultimate-guitar.com/tab/eric-clapton/autumn-leaves-chords-1009824#4804462)

In other words: The first part (Em7 A7 Dmaj7 Gmaj7) is summer The second part (C#m7b5 F#7 Bm) is autumn ;-)

reply

4
